definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: The drought and crop failure were the most serious in North China in a hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 那幾年，華北平原發生了百年不遇的大旱災和歉收。

sentences.english: Tuanbowa Reservoir is a saline-alkaline man-made lake in the North China plain.
sentences.chinese: 天津市團泊窪水庫屬華北平原濱海鹽鹼性水庫。

sentences.english: My hometown lies on the Plain of North China.
sentences.chinese: 我的家鄉位於華北平原。

sentences.english: In ancient times, there were many lakes on the North China Plain.
sentences.chinese: 歷史時期，華北平原曾經有衆多的湖泊。

definition: Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, abbr. 寧|宁[Ning2], capital Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Ying2 chuan1]
pinyin: Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1

definition: Lishi district of Lüliang city 呂梁市|吕梁市[Lu:3 liang2 shi4], Shanxi 山西
Qi county in Hebi 鶴壁|鹤壁[He4 bi4], Henan
Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005
Lop Nor, salt lake and nuclear testing site in Xinjiang
Yunnan and Guizhou plateau in southwest China, covering east Yunnan, whole of Guizhou, west of Guangxi and southern margins of Sichuan, Hubei and Hunan
Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
Sanmenxia prefecture level city in Henan
